name: The Christmas Tree (HirukaGamage)
description: "Step into the shoes of a young boy who finds himself alone in the house on Christmas Eve. Determined to make the most of the holiday season, he decides to decorate the house and create a beautiful Christmas tree all by himself. Help him search the house for the items he needs to create the perfect tree. Solve puzzles and complete mini-games to unlock the items, and then use your creativity to decorate the tree with lights, ornaments, and more. Experience the joy of the season and create lasting memories with this heartwarming game."
